author: Krisztian Sandor
title: Bitcoin Carried Crypto Markets in 2025's First Half as Altcoins Crumbled. What's Next?
description: Crypto stayed flat in a volatile first half of the year thanks to bitcoin. Meanwhile, Ethereum's ETH, Solana's SOL and small caps endured steep losses.
content:
On the surface, the crypto market barely moved in the first half of 2025.
Despite all the tantrum about tariffs, impending recession, war, and heightened expectations of crypto friendly policies and… [+2091 chars]
